channel.title: For new people
channel.description: Well I suggest that moparisthebest should make it so new people like some how direct them straight to a section about rules. Then give them a quiz to see if they no where and what to post. Kinda like on moparscape. They have to pass the quiz before posting. And after they pass the test should have like 5 right posts in the right sections following the rules. They only have the lets say "Rules And Quiz For New." when they sign up.

item.title: For new people
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“norhe, post:26, topic:182355”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=244017.msg2068697#msg2068697 date=1203578218]

[quote author=norhe link=topic=244017.msg2068491#msg2068491 date=1203571709]
lol no they wouldnt a lot of people now a days dont read the rules. they jsut pick i read them and go on their way.
[/quote]And look whose talking.
[/quote] i bet you didnt either so be quite.[/quote]Haha, actually a month after I joined I wasn’t here much then I went back and read em.

Read full topic

item.title: For new people
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

Or…
On the T.O.S, the rules will be in a different order, and it generates what to do with each rule EX. Find the 3rd letter of the sentence and so on and so on. Then for the field below they have to put the letters in sequence.

Read full topic

item.title: For new people
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Mopman:

How are you going to force them to read it? It’s impossible.

Go home to them with a gun, then i think it is possible to force them, and if they can’t read you can read the rules to them.

[quote=“Mopman, post:13, topic:182355”][quote author=ThugLife link=topic=244017.msg2064214#msg2064214 date=1203402539]

Hmmm…when I joined there wasn’t a quiz. Sorry didn’t notice

Yes but there was a point where mopar made EVERY user including already registered take the quiz again before they could carry on posting.
[/quote]

Really? I never did… o_O[/quote]
Maybe since you had a Pikachu under you name, Pikachu do the quiz for you.
Lots of good thing with having a Pikachu.

Read full topic

Typing “yes” doesn’t mean they read it.

item.title: For new people
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:5, topic:182355”]Well as if there could be something coded to check it like with key words

} } Check Section "Questions" } Search words = ? / how / help ////// common words asked as questions { Check Section "General Discussion" { Search words = Hi / Bye / { Phrases = "Whats up" { Process repeated 20 times an hour.moparisthebest.com/smf past TOS

} If name NOT past 5 posts = return section ""Rules And Quiz For New." only { Re-Do Quiz } Pass = All Sections / Fail = Same until {loop} Pass

Etc. Cant really code.[/quote]

So then you expect people to make an automatic system for your idea? And I thought we were talking about manual checking, not automatic…

Read full topic

item.title: For new people
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Well as if there could be something coded to check it like with key words

} } Check Section "Questions" } Search words = ? / how / help ////// common words asked as questions { Check Section "General Discussion" { Search words = Hi / Bye / { Phrases = "Whats up" { Process repeated 20 times an hour.moparisthebest.com/smf past TOS

} If name NOT past 5 posts = return section ""Rules And Quiz For New." only { Re-Do Quiz } Pass = All Sections / Fail = Same until {loop} Pass

Etc. Cant really code.

Read full topic

item.title: For new people
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Exactly my assumption. That is why I asked you where you would find the moderators to handle something like this. There are over 300 registrations per single day, and only half the staff online. Only a fourth of them are on for an extended while. This leaves a load of hard work on two or three people every single day. It won’t work manually.

Read full topic
